lead_paragraph: The president defended the success of the meetings on his tour and dismissed the distractions that caught the news media’s attention as overblown.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Tilt to Asia Will Be Lasting, Obama Says
headline.main: Leaving Asia, Obama Predicts U.S. Tilt Toward Region Will Be Lasting

snippet: The president defended the success of the meetings on his tour and dismissed the distractions that caught the news media’s attention as overblown....
abstract: Pres Obama ends final trip to Asia during his presidency with defense of his administration's decision to pivot its foreign policy focus to region; dismisses in press conference concerns about United States' long-term role in region, particularly in light of some of mishaps on trip that reinforced view that resurgent China dominates territory.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
